segments.text: Medicine Industry , this is Peter Bush speaking , can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good afternoon , could you connect this call with Mr Brown , please
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is Li Ping of ABC computer company limited . I'm calling on our Mr Wilson the general manager of our company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm sorry , Mrs Li , Mr Brown is now in a meeting.May I have your number , and ask him to call you back later ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm afraid Mr Wilson would like to speak to Mr Brown right now.He ' s got an urgent matter to discuss with Mr Brown without delay .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok , then would you please hold the line ? Mr Li , the line is through , Mr Brown is ready answering the call , go ahead .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your assistance , Mr Bush .
segments.speaker: S2
